headline: Crypto Reels From a $200 Billion Crash as Casino Crowd Moves On
summary: Cryptocurrencies beyond Bitcoin have been hit hardest in the market downturn that kicked off early October.  A MarketVector index tracking 50 mid- and micro-cap tokens has fallen nearly 70% this year, hitting its weakest level since early 2020.  The retail tide that once lifted everything from Trump-branded coins to dog-theme tokens is no more.

headline: Coinbase (COIN): Taking a Fresh Look at Valuation After Recent Sideways Share Price Action
summary: Coinbase Global (COIN) has been quietly drifting after a mixed few months, and that sideways action is exactly what makes the stock interesting now, especially with crypto sentiment turning more selective. See our latest analysis for Coinbase Global. After a choppy year where the share price return is up 7.66 percent year to date but down over the past quarter, the latest rebound toward 276.92 dollars suggests momentum is stabilising. At the same time, the three year total shareholder return...

headline: Michael Burry slams Bitcoin as ‘worthless’ - now traders react
summary: Listen and subscribe to Stocks In Translation on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever you find your favorite podcast. Is Bitcoin (BTC=F) actually doomed? In this episode of Stocks in Translation, Trustless Media Founder Zack Guzman joins host Jared Blikre and Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Allie Canal to discuss the latest crypto selloff, including Michael Burry’s comments where he called Bitcoin ‘worthless’. Guzman notes that while skeptics sentiments seem to be dropping, mainstream interest is rising. The trio also touch upon Bitcoin’s RSI swing, and the growing Wall Street adoption of crypto through ETFs and Coinbase's (COIN) on-chain initiatives. Twice a week, Stocks In Translation cuts through the market mayhem, noisy numbers and hyperbole to give you the information you need to make the right trade for your portfolio. You can find more episodes here, or watch on your favorite streaming service. This post was written by Lauren Pokedoff
